actionTemplate.title: Make a thin lower lip look fuller
steps: Fill the lips with lip color, focusing on the lower lip
Use a cotton swab to blur the lower lip line slightly downward in the center
Keep corners clean; avoid overlining the sides
Use concealer on a small brush to sharpen the outer edge
Add a touch of gloss to the lower center for volume

rationaleTemplate: Center-only overline adds fullness without looking fake
Clean edges keep the shape polished on camera
